title: Champ select filtering
body:
Hey riot are u guys able to make it so we can filter our champs in champ select by the new Champ classifications you guys were talking about? 
Like we can either type out the class/sub-class name or we could also have a drop down menu next to the search bar with all the new classification.

For those that dont know what the new class and sub-classes are here a link
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/dev-blog-classes-subclasses

replies.body:
You can do this now on the legacy client... type "marksman" or "support" in the search bar, and you will sort only champs classified as those roles.  It doesn't auto-complete for you, though.  You need to type the whole word.  I don't know if all the subclasses work, but the main ones definitely do.

We will also have this feature on the client update, we're using the role icons for "marksman", "support", etc. as buttons for fast sorting at the top of the champion grid, and there will also be filtering in the search field.  We'll try to auto-complete for you, tho  :)

Will you allow us to create our own sorting categories too? That would be helpful if I want to sort it by positions (Top, Mid, Support,etc). Maybe some could sort it by faction (Demacia, Shurmia, Ionia). Or we could just make a "Favorite* category for the champs we like the most regardless of role or position.

I really like the idea of more keywords when you search, and I think it's a goal of ours to make it easier to type some familiar keywords into the search bar and get cool results.  Things like factions are a smart one, I know I often want to play a yordles-only game. :D

Keep sending in feedback like this, and through the tool in the client!
Please, my friends and I have been asking for this for over a year now
